query.name: findByDatasetId
query.sql: SELECT * FROM ARCHIVED_DATASET_FILE WHERE DATASET_ID = ? ORDER BY archived_dataset_file_id desc

query.name: findByDatasetIdByDate
query.sql: SELECT * FROM ARCHIVED_DATASET_FILE WHERE DATASET_ID = ? ORDER BY date_created desc

query.name: findByJobUuid
query.sql: SELECT * FROM ARCHIVED_DATASET_FILE WHERE JOB_UUID=? AND STATUS = 'COMPLETED' ORDER BY date_created desc

query.name: update
query.sql: UPDATE ARCHIVED_DATASET_FILE SET NAME=?, DATASET_ID=?, EXPORT_FORMAT_ID=?, FILE_REFERENCE=?, FILE_SIZE=?, RUN_TIME=?, OWNER_ID=?, DATE_CREATED=?, FORMAT=?, STATUS=?, JOB_UUID=?, DATASET_FILE_UUID=? WHERE ARCHIVED_DATASET_FILE_ID=?

query.name: create
query.sql: INSERT INTO ARCHIVED_DATASET_FILE (NAME, DATASET_ID, EXPORT_FORMAT_ID, FILE_REFERENCE, FILE_SIZE, RUN_TIME, OWNER_ID, DATE_CREATED, FORMAT, STATUS, JOB_UUID, DATASET_FILE_UUID) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
